about_the_game:
Wings of the Skyworld is a third-person action-adventure set in a beautifully crafted low-poly fantasy world. As ancient darkness stirs, the Dark Goddess, once sealed away, is on the verge of breaking free. The world’s last hope rests in the hands of warriors from a forgotten era, awakened from their slumber to face this looming threat.

Take control of one of these legendary warriors and embark on a journey across a small but richly detailed open world. Glide gracefully between floating islands, delve into mysterious dungeons, and unlock the secrets hidden within this sky-bound realm.

Key Features:

  • Procedurally Generated Dungeons: Experience a new challenge every time with dynamically created dungeons filled with mazes, obstacle courses, treasures, and enemies.
  • Skill Mastery: Defeat enemies and absorb their abilities to enhance your combat prowess.
  • Sword Collection: Find and wield a variety of elemental swords, each with unique skills—choose the right combination for your preferred combat style.
  • Glide to Explore: Use your wings to glide from island to island, discovering new areas and uncovering hidden secrets as you traverse the skies.

This demo is the vertical slice of the full game. The demo consists of at least 1 hr of play time with unlimited replayability with procedural dungeons.

As ancient darkness stirs, the Dark Goddess, once sealed away, is on the verge of breaking free. name: Wings of the Skyworld Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 / AMD A6
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 4GB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7 / AMD A8
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080 8GB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Wings of the Skyworld is a third-person action-adventure set in a stunning low-poly fantasy world. Glide between floating islands, conquer procedurally generated dungeons, and wield powerful elemental swords to stop the Dark Goddess from breaking free..
